DOC.brief_summary: This study purpose evaluate long-term efficacy safety repeat treatment YVOIRE® contour inject anteromedial malar region subject complete LG-HACL014 study .
DOC.brief_title: Extension Clinical Study Evaluate Long-term Efficacy Safety Repeat Treatment YVOIRE® Contour Injected Into Anteromedial Malar Region Subjects Who Have Completed LG-HACL014 Study
DOC.criteria: Eligible subject complete LGHACL014 study Have anteromedial malar region volume loss least onepoint bad MFAS compare 2 week treatment LGHACL014 study Accept obligation receive mid facial procedure treatment study Signed informed consent Those fall one follow 3 case 1 . Males females surgically sterile 2 . PostMenopausal females 45 year age 2 year last menstruation 3 . Fertile premenopausal female male without surgical sterilization , agree use least two contraception method ( one barrier method must include ) 14 day repeat treatment investigational device avoid pregnancy Have history hypertrophic scar keloids Other criterion identify protocol
